mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.ClockChecker

class mocafe.angie.af_sourcing.ClockChecker(mesh: dolfin.cpp.mesh.Mesh, radius, start_point='east')

Class representing a clock checker, i.e. an object that checks if a given condition is met in the surroundings of a point of the mesh.

__init__(mesh: dolfin.cpp.mesh.Mesh, radius, start_point='east')

inits a ClockChecker, which will check if a condition is met inside the given radius

Parameters

  • mesh – mesh

  • radius – radius where to check if the condition is met

  • start_point – starting point where to start checking. If the point is east, the clock checker will start checking from the point with the lower value of x[0]; if the point is west the clock cheker will start from the point with higher value of x[0]

Methods

__init__(mesh, radius[, start_point])

inits a ClockChecker, which will check if a condition is met inside the given radius

clock_check(point, function, threshold, ...)

clock-check the given function in the surrounding of the given point
